針.definition: needle; pin; injection; stitch; CL:根[gen1],支[zhi1]

針刺.definition: to prick with a needle; to treat by acupuncture

針劑.definition: fluid loaded into a syringe for a hypodermic injection

針對.definition: to target; to focus on; to be aimed at or against; in response to

針尖兒對麥芒兒.pinyin: zhēn jiān ér duì mài máng ér
針尖兒對麥芒兒.definition: see 針尖對麥芒|针尖对麦芒[zhen1 jian1 dui4 mai4 mang2]

針尖對麥芒.definition: sharply opposed to each other, with neither prepared to give an inch (idiom)

針尾沙錐.definition: (bird species of China) pin-tailed snipe (Gallinago stenura)

針尾綠鳩.definition: (bird species of China) pin-tailed green pigeon (Treron apicauda)

針尾鴨.definition: (bird species of China) northern pintail (Anas acuta)

針氈.definition: needle felting (craft); piece of felt used as a pincushion

針灸.definition: acupuncture and moxibustion; to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion

針砭.definition: to critique; to voice concerns about; ancient form of acupuncture using sharp stones as needles

針箍兒.definition: erhua variant of 針箍|针箍[zhen1 gu1]

針線活兒.definition: needlework; working for a living as a needleworker

針鋒相對.definition: to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat; measure for measure

針頭.definition: tip of a needle; syringe needle

針頭線腦.definition: needle and thread; sewing implements; needlework; (fig.) unimportant thing
